title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8146.01 - City of Corning
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8146.01 - City of Corning

State Regulations
(a) Route 414. Route 414 between Route 17 and East Pulteney Street. (b) Bridge Street. Bridge Street between

Route 17 and East Pulteney Street. (c) East Pulteney Street. East Pulteney

Street between Bridge Street and Centerway Boulevard, Route 414. (d) Warren Street. Warren Street between East

Pulteney Street and Riverside Drive. (e) Riverside Drive. Riverside Drive between

Bridge Street and Warren Street. (f) Museum Way. Museum Way between Warren

Street and Centerway Boulevard, Route 414. (g) Front Street. Front Street between Bridge

Street and Corning Glass Works terminal. (h) Chestnut Street. Chestnut Street between

Route 17 and Corning Glass Works terminal. (i) Walnut Street. Walnut Street between

Route 17 and Corning Glass Works terminal. (j) Pine Street. Pine Street between Route 17
and Tioga Avenue. (k) Steuben

Street. Steuben Street between Route 17 and Corning Glass Works
terminal. (l) Conhocton Street. Conhocton Street between Route 17 and Woodview Avenue. (m) Tioga Avenue. Tioga Avenue between Pine

Street and Steuben Street. (n) East

Market Street. East Market Street between Steuben Street and Canisteo

Street. (o) Woodview Avenue. Woodview Avenue between Steuben Street and Canisteo Street. (p) Canisteo Street. Canisteo Street between

East Market Street and Woodview Avenue. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8146.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
